title: Waltz mambo
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird and Andrew Quinn
brief_description: Two choreographed dance movements presented in a computer animated form. The film shows a day in the life of three cones in waltz time; a rhumba played and danced by three musical instruments
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird and Andrew Quinn
